# No patches have been applied to SoftFloat-3e
set(EMBEDDED_SOFTFLOAT_SOURCES
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/8086/f128M_isSignalingNaN.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/8086/extF80M_isSignalingNaN.c"

    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_sub1XM.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_sub256M.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_subM.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_subMagsF16.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_subMagsF32.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_subMagsF64.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_tryPropagateNaNF128M.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/s_tryPropagateNaNExtF80M.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/f16_mulAdd.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/f128M_mulAdd.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/softfloat_state.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/ui32_to_f128M.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/ui64_to_f128M.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/ui32_to_extF80M.c"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/ui64_to_extF80M.c"
)

add_library(embedded_softfloat STATIC ${EMBEDDED_SOFTFLOAT_SOURCES})
target_compile_features(embedded_softfloat PUBLIC c_std_99)
target_include_directories(embedded_softfloat PUBLIC
    "SoftFloat-3e-prebuilt"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/8086"
    "SoftFloat-3e/source/include"
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(embedded_softfloat PRIVATE "/w /O2")
else()
    target_compile_options(embedded_softfloat PRIVATE "-O3")
endif()
